attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"The grammar school system...was a response to the needs of a vanished society which required a small educated class and a large number of manual workers.  It is no longer the appropriate model for a world where most jobs require educated men and women" [Tony Blair, June 1996]

Grammar schools provide an anarchronistic system of education which does not raise standards overall. 

Standards have risen, not fallen, since comprehensive education was introduced.

The 'escape from poverty' defence of selection has been greatly over-stated.

Additional provision of selective education threatens equal and inclusive advancement...an aim for any civilised society.
